Title: Dixie Times
Director: Sherrie Peterson, Ken R. Wheeler, Stacey Turner
Actors: Stacey Turner, Ken R. Wheeler, Andrew Santamaria, Kim Palmer
Plot: A moonshiner turned sheriff's deputy helps bring in the bad guys armed with duct tape. The local newspaper reporter now has some major events to write about, and a sleepy little Alabama farming community is making the news all over Dixie.
